content: knitted jumper with raglan in drops brushed alpaca silk piece is knitted with lace pattern size xs xxl drops design pattern as-129 yarn group c or a + a **size** xs - s - m - l - xl xxl **materials** drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-125-125-150-150-175 g colour 22 pale rust **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 and 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 80 cm for rib
